content.detailedDescription: I stepped outside around 10:40 pm to watch the sky, since there has been a lot of interesting activity of late, and it was a clear night with good visibility. i was not disappointed! i quickly noticed a star-like object moving due-west to due-east, making slight course corrections and speed changes. i pointed it out to my mother, who said it was an interesting "satellite", and went inside. i had noticed earlier that day that birds seemed to be acting strangely around town; chirping, squawking, and flying back and forth as if they were alarmed about something. at the time of the sighting, i could hear birds chirping to each other from the trees, all over the place; this was unusual for being this late in the evening. just before the sighting, the dogs in my neighborhood were barking quite a lot, which is also unusual. after seeing the first object, the activity only increased. lots of bright flashes and streaks of light. most of the objects i saw eventually dimmed until they were invisible; occasionally a streak of light would appear where i had just lost visibility of an object. some of them moved in groups of 2, flying in perfect formation. twice i saw an object appear that pulsated slowly from invisible to extremely bright and back again, while following a very curvy, looping flight path. the second pulsating object appeared to "slalom" between the stars of ursa major, which made me laugh out loud in disbelief and amazement. other times i would see a stationary object appear just long enough to become incredibly bright, then disappear. later in the evening i saw a couple of these that seemed to be coming from on the ground. observed what i thought were stars low on the horizon, but realized they were actually objects hovering. i steadied myself against the side of my house and lined one of these "stars" up with the edge of a neighboring house, and saw that it was actually moving around within a small space (as if to appear stationary?). one of these hovering objects appeared to eject another similar yet smaller object, which traveled straight down until i lost sight of it. throughout this sighting, i observed airplanes of every size traveling in a variety of directions, and at a variety of altitudes. i saw a couple of helicopters, and heard a helicopter at other times when none were visible. with all this activity, i was quite mesmerized; after a while feeling sort of foggy and spaced-out. eventually i realized i was pretty cold, and my neck hurt from craning my head up to the sky for so long. i went inside and was somewhat surprised to see that it was now 1:40 am; i had been out there for three hours watching the sky! there was still plenty of activity going on, but it seemed to be winding down, and it was getting late, so i went to bed. the next day, the heavy airplane traffic continued, and at 10:00 am, i noticed a white/gray helicopter circling around town. it kept circling back over, and a couple of times seemed to be moving directly over our house. by 2:00 pm, the helicopter was still up there, doing its "rounds". this was the most active night i have observed (ever!), but there have been interesting sightings in the sky almost every night recently (when visibility is good). not sure what all the hubbub is all about, but something is certainly going on up there. if you live anywhere near whatcom county, just take a look up on a clear night, and you'll see.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 30-40+ "star-like" objects moving alone & in pairs, some pulsating, some hovering, some changing directions, etc! wow!

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in the back yard talking on the phone looking into the sky towards the south when i saw an orange light ascend i thought at first it was a firework but it stopped and started to pulsate strangely. it then started to move slowly across the sky to the west until i could no longer see it glowing. i ran into the house and told my parents. when i went back out it was back in the same spot and moved around slowly from left to right, i called to my parents and they came out and watched it move around in the sky. then it started moving towards the west again over the everglades.
content.summary: A orange red glowing ball appeared in s sw sky

content.detailedDescription:
As related to asd by phone today: 
i was working the night shift in the printer shop at lake city army ammunition plant in august of 1969. i started work at 12:00 am and it was very hot, about 110 degrees so we had the fans on. there were seven of us working in this building, which is the second building after the guard shack on the east side of the property. at 3:00 am all of the electricity at the plant went out so we could not work. the seven of us went outside to sit on the dock and that is when we noticed a strange chrome colored sphere hovering over a building that was four buildings from our position. this object was shining very bright and it was about the width of a small plane. it hovered over that building for a while, then very slowly and silently moved across the road to another building. there is one long main road going through the plant property and this thing moved back and forth, going over each building. there were no emissions and no effects other than the electricity going out. shortly after we noticed this object we saw a jeep with mp's speeding down the road, then two more jeeps with mp's. they were all driving around like crazy. this went on for two hours, until at approximately 5:00 am the object suddenly shot up into the air at about a 30 degree angle and into space at an alarming speed - it was literally out of sight in a half a second! then all of the power came back on. i did not see any other people come out of the buildings, but the docks are in the back so we wouldn't have seen them. the first thing i thought of was "they're back" because i saw a similar object, only disk shaped when i was eight years old while playing with my sister one day. it was also a very shiny chrome color and there was no sound. everyone thought we were crazy so i never talked about it again. now there was a guy with us that night at lake city who mentioned that he saw a round chrome sphere over the dairy farm he was working at a few years prior (1965 or so),and this was off of 7 highway in blue springs not far from lake city. he was our cameraman at lake city and was age 60 or so at the time and i believed him. 
the next day when i arrived at work two men came in that we had never seen before. one was wearing a black suit and the other was wearing a dark grey suit. they had no insignia, and showed no i.D.'s to us, and did not tell us who they were. only one man spoke, and he said "remember you all have signed a security clearance and you did not see anything last night." he was very firm about it. we did not say anything. then they left. while at work that night the seven of us talked about what we saw and we were all in agreement about the description, however, i did not tell anyone about this event until now. i saw the show about missouri on the hangar 1 show and thought i'd call this in to report it. i am 68 years old now and don't think they'll do anything if i talk about what i saw.
content.summary: Huge chrome sphere over army ammunition plant in 1969

content.detailedDescription: At this time, i was living in independence oregon, and commuting to work in corvallis oregon. this was about a 30 minute drive on a 2-lane highway through the countryside, and since i worked graveyard shift, there was often very little traffic. this was the case on the night in-question; my friend/co-worker and i were returning home from work at approximately 4:00 am, and at this time did not notice a single other vehicle on the road. i was driving, and suddenly my attention was drawn to movement in my peripheral vision. looking out the driver's-side window, i was amazed to see a huge glowing blue sphere moving slowly through the sky. this blue sphere (a similar shade of blue as the light on an "indiglo" wrist watch) was surrounded by green flames, and left a green flame "trail" behind it as it moved. this object appeared to be quite large and moving at what seemed to be a fairly low altitude. while i had observed a large number of "star-like" objects moving unusually during this time period, i had never before seen anything like this. afraid i was hallucinating or losing my mind, & immediately smacked my friend on the shoulder, pointed out my window, and asked:  "do you see that?!" my friend leaned over and looked up and out the driver's-side window, as his jaw dropped and his eyes widened. "holy... sh**!!" was all he replied. "what do you see?" i asked him. "it's like a huge blue ball with green flames!" he exclaimed. confident now that this was indeed really happening, we both watched in amazement as this strange object slowly cruised past us and disappeared over the tree-line of the hills ahead of us. the next day, other co-workers mentioned a news report that day of a meteor landing in a school playground in portland oregon, which caused damage to the playground. i cannot corroborate the news story as any more than heresay, but the object we observed was heading north, in the direction of portland. but it sure didn't look like any meteor or shooting star i have ever seen or heard of..
content.summary: While driving home from work (graveyard shift), my friend & i saw a large glowing blue sphere with green flame trail slowly cross the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I live in northwest new jersey. on june 3rd, 2014 around 11:30 at night, my mom and i looked out the window just out of curiosity to look at the stars and to our amazement we saw a bright orange orb west of us glowing above the tree line. it was unlike anything we had ever seen before. it was bright orange and extremely big. we then proceeded to go outside to watch it. we looked at it for a good 5-10 minutes and then went inside. about a half hour later it was absolutely no where to be found. we kept looking outside to see if we could find it, and it completely disappeared leaving us extremely confused. we are huge believers of ufos and believe that is what we saw that night.
content.summary: Orange orb above tree line

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting inside when a friend told me to go outside. i went to the parking lot of the apartment complex where there were also about two dozen other people watching it. it was really close to us. it was a triangular shaped aircraft with blue lights. it was disappearing and then reappearing getting closer and closer. i felt very frightened and unsafe. i called the police. as i reported it, it disappeared heading east.
content.summary: Ufo was visible in the sky with bright blue lights following a path, kept disappearing and reappearing

content.detailedDescription: I wanted to get this some attention for various reasons.  i have never seen anything on tv, the internet, or any other source about this event that affected an entire town called bass lake, california.  my father told me about this and he has never reported it but will discuss it.  i don't remember the exact date but it was in the 60's.  my dad and his friend were hitch hiking to bass lake, california when the sighting happened.  it was a two lane highway going towards bass lake when my dad and his friend found a mattress on the side of the road.  they were tired and took advantage of it and layed there looking at the stars in the night sky.  my father noticed an object in the sky towards the east of his position with three lights.  it was triangle in shape and the lights were that of the primary colors.  red, green, and blue i believe.  him and his friend watched it for a few minutes intrigued when it suddenly went from not moving at all to another point in the sky towards the west and stopped on a dime.  he told me that if he had blinked he would have missed it and it must have traveled 10 or so miles in one second.  this got their attention and the craft sat there in sky and darted again towards the south and stopped.  they said they watched this go on for 30 minutes or so until it disappeared.  now the most important part of this event comes a month or so later when my dad moved in with the sheriff of bass lake at that time.  one night my dad and the sheriffs wife were talking about ufo's and my dad mentioned what he and his friend witnessed one night and the sheriffs wife told my dad to not mention it to the sheriff.  well, my dad did ask him about it and the sheriff at first was unwilling to discuss it but as my dad described what he saw, the sheriff told him that he saw the exact same thing from his position the same night.  what happened to the sheriff and the entire town after that was what was really interesting.  the fbi, cia, and nasa flocked to the town of bass lake, california and would not allow the sheriff to leave the county for whatever reason but my dad knows and i would like whoever is reading this to contact me so i can put you in contact with him.  the entire town was taken over by the government until their investigation was over with and nobody was allowed to leave.  i cannot tell you more than this as my dad has the details.  my dad does not believe in ufo's but he cannot explain what he saw that night.  i myself visited bass lake in the past and spoke to my dads old girlfriend who was witness to this event and i can tell you that she told me not a lot of people who were around at that time will talk about it.  this event has eluded everyone and from what i can tell has never been spoke of on tv, internet, or anything for that matter.  please call me for more information.  i cannot be sure the exact year and date, my dad has that info.  this needs to be looked into.  thank you
content.summary: 1960's ufo sighting at night/ fbi, nasa closed the town of bass lake

content.detailedDescription:
case # 55194

there were two witnesses to this event. the event took place at 11:00 pm and was observed for 2 ��� 3 minutes.
there was a full moon which was very bright. the witness was returning home after work and that���s why he knew the exact time. he then saw a craft over the road near his home. he drove to the top of the hill which overlooks a valley area. this was through his drive and onto his neighbor���s property. it was bright orange like a sunset. as bright as it was there was no light cast. no sound.
he said it was 600 feet from him and bigger than the neighbors house.  it was 75 ��� 100 feet across. he described it as gorgeous.
he felt honored to have seen it. the witness said 3 days later he heard of the exact ship spotted in texas. orange, no windows, and disc shape.
after a minute it was hard to keep his eyes on it. however it didn���t hurt his eyes. it wasn���t too bright for that. he wanted to watch more but felt like they wanted us to look away.
this took place in 1995 by kingsley, michigan. due to the closeness of the object i feel he did witness something unexplainable.

unknown uav
content.summary: Witness observed orange glow over trees and house

content.detailedDescription: When we were walking to the pool i looked up in notice a really bright blue and white diamond shape object in the sky it would speed up and slow down it had no flashing lights and no sound.A few nights before i was looking up in the sky and noticed the same bright object. when i looked up i saw this bright light and it was stationary had no movement then it got real bright and moved then it got real bright and moved again it made a triangle shape pattern then disappeard the only time the object moved is win it lit up after it made the triangle i didn't see it anymore there was absolutely no sound to the object
content.summary: Diamond shape object with blueish white light when directly above us light got brighter .The light was solid and object had no flashing lights

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to work, down spunky canyon toward bouquet, at 4:19 am, at the bottom of the mountain, i went around the small corner to the straight away, and right as i came around there was 3 huge lights in the fornation of an upside down triangle. as i drove down the straight away, the lower left light went from being stationary with the rest, to hovering inward. as i turned onto bouquet, i lost sight of the lights because the car behind me was tailgating me very aggressively, and the truck infront of me pulled over to look at the lights. the area has no service for 20 minutes and is a rural canyon rd. so when i got into town, i tried to call my sister, and it didn't make a ringing sound, but a weird electrical cracking ive never heard before.
content.summary: 3 big lights in the shape of an upside down triangle, very low, 1 light started moving inward

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting o/s in the rear yard,i was sitting in the hot tub,it was dusk o/s i was looking at the skyline and right behind that i can see the wanaque resivour,it was a cloudy night,as i was sitting there,out of my left line of sight the sky went black,like i was blinded,i felt an absolute fear come over me,(im a retired paterson police officer,and when i tell you( nothing or anyone scares me ever)i mean it.I felt terror,as this thing passed from left to right,i could not tell how far from me it was,i jumped out of the hot tub,my dog who was inside the house about 5 ft from me looking out through the glass slider doors also saw something and started to go nuts barking hair standing up the works,then both my neighbors back yard sensor lights came on both  houses left and right,as the object moved past,then it was over,when i tried to let the dog out ,she would not go,as if she was scared.It was as if what ever was moving past me,was almost like a very large shadow.Or something that was being shrowded.
content.summary: Was out side at dusk looking at the skyline which was gray sky and getting dark,when from left to right a object came into view that was black but almost invisible,moved across  my line of sight to the right slowly and left the area its an area of trees

content.detailedDescription: Driving up pleasant street i saw a bright orange sphere towards high street. there were people on high street looking up at it. i watched it as i drove past spruce street and crossed the bridge as best i could. when i got on brockway ave. i pulled into the daily kneads parking lot to get a better stationary look. it appeared to be hovering just blow the clouds. it was stationary though. it had a slight wobble. imagine a ping pong ball sitting on top of water. it slowing started heading north at first horizontal but then ascending up into the cloud cover. i could see the orange light reflect onto the cloud right before it entered. the period when it started moving it still maintaining a slight up and down motion, as if it was riding very shallow waves. maybe it was the very damp air last night, but i couldn't make out a very clear shape, even though it appeared to be  very close to the ground. it just seemed like a ball of bright red/orange light with very hazy edges.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Glowing orange light right under cloud level

content.detailedDescription:
My daughter was recording a lightning storm and the full moon while flying inbound on a 737 approaching orlando int'l airport on 8/13/11(she knows i like to record lightning and wanted to impress me with her videography skills). she copied the video from her iphone, gave it to me with a "check this out" comment but never mentioned or seemed to notice the orb on the video which suddenly appeared from within the moon glow and darted about. the bright orange orb seemed to be attracted to the lightning. it moved in rapidly towards the lightning cloud during a lightning strike... then disappeared within the full moon glow when no lightning, then emerged again. at first i thought the orb was a reflection from inside the cabin on the window, but the orb angle/movement is inconsistent with an inside cabin light. 

imho, i think this is a real ufo which may be re-charging or using the lightning as a travel gateway opening. i also think it's peculiar that at  first it was obscured by the moon (hiding) then emerged when the lightning strike happened - like it didn't care about the passing plane since it had no other options but to emerge to refuel or exit the earth. also, when i asked my daughter about it she didn't know what i was talking about and claims she never noticed it. mass hypnosis?
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Recording lightning/full moon then ufo appeared

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i were outside on their front lawn, enjoying an evening of sky watching, looking for satellites and shooting stars. it was a perfectly clear night, no cloud cover at all, and the parking lot lights from the local business parks behind and in front of their home had just been turned off (the timers are set for midnight). the stars immediately became more visible and even the milky way began to show after a few minutes. while sitting in my camp chair with my head tilted back, staring up, i noticed 4 pale lights of equal magnitude, no brighter (but slightly larger) than the surrounding stars moving north to south, directly overhead, and cruising fairly quickly. it covered its own apparent diameter approximately 5 times in a second. 3 of the lights were in a perfect triangle, with the 4th light exactly in the middle. the lights did not blink, waver or change colors. i immediately pointed them out to my friend, exclaiming: "what the f**k is that?!? what is that!?" my first fleeting impression was a low flying jet, but it made no sound at all and the lights were not in any formation i had ever witnessed before. we stared at them as they passed perfectly silently overhead and continued in a straight line due south. the lights (or object, as i believe it was) appeared to be very low, only a couple of thousand feet above, much lower and closer than any other aircraft (with the exception of a probable police helicopter) we had seen that day or night, before or after this sighting. a few aircraft had been visible that night (none directly overhead) including 3 very loud military helicopters in a strung-out formation earlier in the afternoon heading south, though far to the east, low on the horizon. what was likely a police helicopter passed low, loud and close by a few minutes after the sighting, just south of us and heading due east.  my estimation of the object's altitude is based on the respective angle of the lights, which quickly became foreshortened as it passed overhead. the lights were only visible for 6-8 seconds, and became dimmer as they got closer to the treeline on the horizon. before they even came close to the tops of the trees, they quickly dimmed and then disappeared completely. every other conventional aircraft i have ever seen flying has very bright white and red strobe lights that are visible from miles away, at any angle, and sometimes even during daylight hours. this object had nothing resembling conventional aircraft lighting. i have been an aviation enthusiast since i was a child, and have often watched aircraft of all sorts flying at all hours. this was nothing like anything i have ever seen before. it gave me chills of excitement; i knew we had just witnessed something very high-tech, stealthy and rare. a true ufo in the strictest definition.
content.summary: 4 pale white lights no brighter than stars in a perfect triangle formation with one in the center passed silently overhead.

content.detailedDescription: My family returned home and i was removing some things from the trunk of the car when i noticed a star like object, at a high altitude, traveling from south to north. i immediately went into the house to retrieve my camera. after capturing photos of this object i sat on the front stairs awaiting any similar type object(s). several minutes later i observed what appeared to be an almost cross shaped object slightly descend from the western sky. i quickly began to take pictures of this dull red object as it tracked across the sky seemingly just above the tree line going from west to northeast.
content.summary: Dull red glowing object observered just above the treetops

content.detailedDescription: Just finished listening to a show on the computer, i went to lock up my patio door and looked up and noticed the star-like object hovering in the sky. it was moving side to side, and up and down a little but i did notice that it was in fact moving a little in the same spot.
content.summary: Star-like object

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were drivingway from the convient store on our way to my mom's. i was entering the turning lane when i saw a reddish orange light moving fro
m a northeast direction to a southeastern direction when i asked my wife to grab the steering wheel so i can grab my phone to take some pictures and i took three then made my left turn then i pulled into my mom's driveway it took maybe15 seconds to pull in because my mom lives three houses from the corner after i pulled into the driveway i ju
mped out to take more pictures but it was gone so i walked out into the middle of the street and didn't see any sign of it after that my wife and i went in and told the family and showed the pictures that i took
content.summary: I was turningwhen i spotted a reddidsh orange light,i told my wife to grab the wheel & took sum pictures i turned stopped the jumped out & tried to take more pics but it was gone

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were drivingway from the convient store on our way to my mom's. i was entering the turning lane when i saw a reddish orange light moving fro
m a northeast direction to a southeastern direction when i asked my wife to grab the steering wheel so i can grab my phone to take some pictures and i took three then made my left turn then i pulled into my mom's driveway it took maybe15 seconds to pull in because my mom lives three houses from the corner after i pulled into the driveway i ju
mped out to take more pictures but it was gone so i walked out into the middle of the street and didn't see any sign of it after that my wife and i went in and told the family and showed the pictures that i took
content.summary: I was turningwhen i spotted a reddidsh orange light,i told my wife to grab the wheel & took sum pictures i turned stopped the jumped out & tried to take more pics but it was gone

content.detailedDescription: I came to seside oregon today,combed the skys,called for a sign there was a orb,but on play back there was a ship that warped into my frame,then it was gone.An hour before that i saw a triangular thing on the thurmals shaped painted like an bald eagle,but it wasnt.In the orb i lost sight after the clouds contrasted the blue sky.It felt positive, i thought it was a balloon at first,but it was an orb.
content.summary: Orb flow below moon,on playback a ship warped in the gone as fast.

content.detailedDescription: a friend texted me after 11pm from another state he was visiting and said some stars were dancing, following and moving strangely.  so i went outside with my son and after a few minutes we spotted a star like object then two moving strangely in the sky. then one was left and zipped around in sort bursts in all various directions. sometimes moving   large distances then returning back to a position. i was an army satellite field engineer and have never seen satellites move in such a manner. cannot say what was moving up there, but was not normal. at times the color and shape appears to change a little bit. wow.
content.summary: Dancing star like objects, satellites don't do that. i was an army satellite field engineer.

content.detailedDescription: I just got home at 9:30 pm.6/4/2014 i  stood outside to smoke a cigarette in front of my apartment building. it was a clear night, no clouds . i then saw clear as day, this object in the sky shoot up . its made a complete stop, hoovered and swaying gently from side to side  it slowly started to rise again, and just suddenly went back down from wherever it came from.There is a mountain not to far from here. next to it is an airport. iv seen airplanes before, but this was something i have never seen before. there where several witnesses that also live in the same complex that saw this ufo.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Teardropped,glowing green and red lights

content.detailedDescription: Taking a smoke break with coworker behind building. looking at how clear the sky was, i point out a strange plane. it looked like an old war plane you'd see in movies. about 30 minutes later we go out to smoke again. i notice a white teardrop craft with glowing edges slowly moving in the sky. i alert my friend who says its a ufo and we run inside to get our phones. by the time we come out, its nowhere to be seen.
content.summary: White tear drop craft in same area as unsual plane seen 30 minutes apart

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 10:45pm eastern time on wednesday in the town of haw river nc, i was heading home from work (a route i take every day). i spotted a strange orange/yellow light in the sky. it was at some distance and i only saw it for about a minute. it was southeast of haw river and apparently stationary. i would guess around five miles or so southeast and maybe at an altitude above 1000 feet. it was sort of shaped like a dumbbell (the kind used for weight training). it remained apparently stationary and i stared at it for about a minute when it flickered out of apparent existence. i tried finding it again in the sky to no avail. about ten minutes later i spotted an odd aircraft that was flickering in a bright blue light that was either stationary or moving very slowly. this strange aircraft was north of mebane nc and at a great height. it may have been another ufo, however it appeared like an aircraft to me.

after about ten minutes from the time of sighting, my face began to feel very hot. it remained hot for about ten minutes or so.

nothing else to report.
content.summary: Spotted strange light to the se of haw river. it flickered then vanished.

content.detailedDescription: Looked up seen object next to moon, but was moving very slow east. it glowed white, no noise. it is heading toward lake michigan right now. i hope some one else see it. if i had a video camera i would of probably seen more detail of ufo as it wasn't that high.
content.summary: Bright glowing ufo heading east toward lake michigan very slow

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 03:15hrs i was awakened by the sound of our family's two dogs barking feverishly. initially i chalked it up to perhaps just their excitement over a possum or some other nocturnal animal; however after about ten minutes their barking did not subside. i proceeded to put on my clothes to go outside, but was extremely hesitant and somewhat fearful based on an encounter just several hours before in a city some 35 miles away. nevertheless, i felt something inside of me compelling me to go outside, to check on the dogs if nothing else. i stood on my porch for several minutes and tried to coax the dogs into being quiet. my efforts failed as the dogs where apparently sensing something farther back in the wooded area of the property which i could not see. i base this on the fact that both dogs were facing in that direction and not only were they barking wildly at this point, but they had also began to growl in between their barking. as stated, i did not see what had the dogs so worked up, so after about 30 minutes i returned inside my home, but i took the precaution of opening the blinds in the living room so that i could keep a lookout outdoors. at around 04:10hrs my brother-in-law began to leave for work, but before doing so, from the window, i observed him go to the back of my mother-in-laws house with a bright flashlight to check on the dogs which were still barking and growling fiercely. not seeing anything he proceeded to leave for work and i once again looked outside for the source of the dogs irritation. i did not go outside this time, but instead simply stood in my front doorway. it is at this time that i observed a dull orange orb ascend from the wooded area of the property in the same direction (north) that the dogs had been facing. the object ascended slowly to a level perhaps 100 or so feet above the tree line then it began a slow trek in a northeastern direction. i observed the object for about two minutes until it disappeared beyond a distant tree line. i was able to capture about 30 digital photos of this object, but i will limit my submission of the same to just a few.
content.summary: Dull orange colored orb moving slowly

content.detailedDescription:
My ufo siting report:

i was in halifax, nova scotia working in the woods when i saw the same green and purple lights i have seen 4 months ago at another location 40kms from halifax.  

fist sighting was at nice, 1:30am when i heard what i thought was a plane yet it didn't move like one.  there were just 2 dots and about 1 minutes later they dissappeared.  i decided to take pictures to see what would come out which surprised me. i was very freaked out when i looked at the photos later.  

the second siting just a few days ago is the one that has me really questioning what these lights could be.  it could have been a glare, but why 2 dots and why the same dots as during a night photo?
content.summary: This is the 2nd time i have seen this happen, exact same colors and sizes.  once during the night, another during the day about 5 months apart.

content.detailedDescription: Set up canon t2i with 55-250mm lens for timelapse on aperature priority (f5.6). faced camera north, zoomed all the way in, and pointed it towards the top of the hill. first photo was taken at 2:41pm on june 1st. interval was 10 seconds. stopped it at 09:21pm, just after sunset. when i finally looked at the footage to edit it, i noticed the bright object, and then all the rest.
content.summary: 12 ufos over washington near eceti

content.detailedDescription: I was on plymouth beach at night and observed a płane with a lot of red lights, about 3-5. it traveled normal then stopped. it then appeared as one red star, went down, up, 2 diagonal perpendicular paths, all 4 paths appeared same distance.  it continued on, but only looked like a red star not a plane, i flashed a light at it, it stopped and blinked a white light once. there was a pause, it blinked once again brighter, i flashed twice, so it flashed twice. i did not fłash again, and kept repeating silently with thought my desire to be left alone politely. at this point it was very close to the pilgrim energy station, and it started from the nw. i was a believer beforehand, as it was happening, i couldn't believe it, that's why i flashed at it, when it responded with the white light i froze. i ch��se not to accept it even after its odd trajectory, until the red star flashed at me in white, it only used white light to flash, a total of 4 times, 1. flash at 2 brightness scales, and two flashes once, after that i didn't look at it again, i looked away and chose to deny its existence.  another attested to have also witnessed it.  i heard a pulsating tunnel effect like sound off the water, always below its prescience. i tried to film it, it looked very small, and it showed one diagonal shooting star like path ne, took another video previous to seeing it, and after noticed a red star, i did erase both videos out of speculation, and just to put it out of my mind, i did not want to be judged for what i know i saw.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Fishing with friend, saw a plane lots of red lights, it stopped, went straight down, then up, then diagonally, then towards nuke plant. i flashed headlamp, it flashed white back, then i flashed twice, and so did it. flash white only, i shut my lamp off.

content.detailedDescription:
On monday, june 3rd at exactly 10pm, i took our dog bella out for a nightly (pre-bedtime) walk. the sky was clear, the stars were out and visibility was unlimited. i look up at the sky nightly during our walk as i have doen since a kid. we walked due east to the end of our road which terminates in scrub-land. there is little in the way of light pollution here so viewing the starlit sky was easy. while facing due east at the end of the road, mars and the crescent moon were above and to the rear of my right shoulder. 

i was drawn to turn 90 degrees to the right (looking south) when through the pine trees i noticed a moving bright light. the light was not a star, meteor or aircraft. it was unusually bright and made no noise as it traveled over my head and off into the north-east. it was much brighter than stars and the usual satellites -- unusually bright. besides the crescent moon, it was easily the brightest object in the sky. i have watched the skies for 40 years and never seen an object of this type before. it was not an rc aircraft, helicopter, balloon etc.

there were no visible strobes or navigational lights (which are usually visible on aircraft in the area as high as 20,000 - 30,000 feet). i could not estimate its size or height as i have no reference but is was clearly high possibly sub-orbital. 

i tried to video the object with my camera phone but unfortunately, it does not cope well with low light levels and resulted in just a black screen upon playback (although i have kept it and may try to enhance the video to see if it reveals anything). i got back into the house within 90 seconds of loosing sight of the object and immediately called up the live tracking info for the international space station (iss) as i thought the bright moon may have made the iss glow with its reflection but the iss was on the west coast of australia travelling south east, -- in the opposite direction to the object on the other side of the world.
content.summary: Noiseless bright light in sky

content.detailedDescription:
I live in orange county ca.

this last month i have seen 2 times a triangle shaped craft moving very fast and quite in our skies.

the first time i saw it was around 5/14 8:30 pm pst. it was moving from se to nw just above the low clouds. there were 4 other witnesses. ( you don���t have time to get out your phone, click the cam button, and get a clear pic of this. it moves so fast and quiet that your lucky enough to just witness it. )

the second time i saw it 2 weeks later ( 9:30pm pst ) by myself having a smoke in the backyard, when i saw a triangle shaped craft moving very fast and quiet, ( nw to se ) but this time it was clear and i could see that the tips of the triangle where reflective but not lighting up or anything. it was blending in well with the nights sky. it was moving so fast across the sky, and yet it was silent. it���s got to be a drone of some sort. it moves to fast to be piloted by human hands. ( at least i would assume so )

has anyone else seen something like this?

the ? " did the object(s) or light(s ) do any of the following? should have a box that indicates: fly at a high rate of speed & move silently through the sky.

just a tip.

thanks,
content.summary: Triangle shaped craft, reflective tips, cloaked with the night sky, moved quite and fast. 2 times i have seen it in 2 weeks
